---
title: "YAML for Each DMP Version"
output:
  word_document: default
  html_document: default
---

### DMP0
```
---
author: Your Name
date: '8/5/2019'
output: 'html_document'
title: DMP Version 0
---
```


### DMP1
```
---
title: "My Data Management Plan"
author: "Gail Clement"
date: "8/5/2019"
output: html_document | word_document | slidy_presentation
---
```

### DMP2
```
---
title: "My Data Management Plan"
author: "Gail Clement"
date: "8/5/2019"
output:
  html_document: default
  word_document: default
---
```
## DMP3
```
---
title: "My Data Management Plan"
author: "Gail Clement"
date: "8/5/2019"
output:
  html_document: default
  word_document: default
bibliography: references.bib  
---
```

## DMP4
```
---
title: "My Data Management Plan"
author: "Gail Clement"
date: "8/5/2019"
output:
  html_document: 
    toc: TRUE
    toc_float: TRUE
    toc_depth: 2
    number_sections: true
    fig_width: 1
    fig_height: 3 
    theme: journal
    highlight: kate
#bibliography: references.bib  
---
```
## DMP4
```
---
title: "My Data Management Plan"
author: "Gail Clement"
date: "8/5/2019"
output:
  html_document: 
    toc: TRUE
    toc_float: TRUE
    toc_depth: 2
    number_sections: true
    fig_width: 1

    theme: journal

#bibliography: references.bib  
---
```

## DMP5
```
---
title: "My Data Management Plan"
author: "Gail Clement"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%d %B, %Y')`"
output:
  html_document: 
    toc: TRUE
    toc_float: TRUE
    toc_depth: 2
    number_sections: true
    theme: journal
    highlight: tango
    fig_width: 1
    fig_height: 3 
#bibliography: references.bib  
---
```
